meanings.definition: A social gathering with traditional Irish music and dancing.
meanings.sent1: The ceili was filled with lively music and joyful dancing.
meanings.sent2: We had a great time at the ceili last night, dancing to Irish tunes.
meanings.sent3: At the ceili, everyone danced so much that they were all out of breath!
meanings.sent4: The ceili was a whirlwind of music and movement, like a colorful festival.
meanings.sent5: The memory of the ceili lingered in their minds, a happy gathering of friends.

meanings.definition: The type of music played at a ceili.
meanings.sent1: The ceili music had a lively beat that made everyone want to dance.
meanings.sent2: The traditional ceili music filled the room with its cheerful melodies.
meanings.sent3: The ceili music was so catchy that it stayed in their heads all night.
meanings.sent4: The ceili music was like a cheerful soundtrack to the evening's festivities.
meanings.sent5: The joyous notes of the ceili music echoed through the hall, inviting everyone to join in the fun.

meanings.sent1: We love to ceili with our friends on weekends.
meanings.sent2: Let's ceili together at the next gathering, it's always so much fun!
meanings.sent3: They decided to ceili every Friday night to unwind after a long week.
meanings.sent4: Ceiliing with others brought a sense of community and joy to their lives.
meanings.sent5: Ceiliing together created lasting memories and strong bonds among the group.

meanings.definition: A type of Irish dance performed at a ceili.
meanings.sent1: The ceili dance was energetic and full of traditional steps.
meanings.sent2: She practiced the ceili dance for weeks to prepare for the event.
meanings.sent3: The ceili dance was so fun, it felt like skipping through a meadow.
meanings.sent4: The dancers moved in perfect harmony, like a well-choreographed ceili dance.
meanings.sent5: The rhythm of the ceili dance pulsed through the room, captivating everyone's attention.
